definitions.definition: in or within a short time; before long; quickly:
examples: She'll soon be here./She'll be here soon.

definitions.definition: at the same time or a very short time after:
examples: As soon as I saw her, I knew there was something wrong.

definitions.definition: If you do something as soon as possible, you do it as quickly as you can:
examples: We need the repairs done as soon as possible.
